dn27:8.3: kosalassa anuyuttā → anantarā anuyuttā (bj, mr); anantarā anuyantā (sya-all)
dn27:11.7: khuddamadhuṃ → khuddamadhu (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); khuddaṃ madhuṃ (mr) | aneḷakaṃ → anelakaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn27:12.2: Yato kho te → yato kho (si, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn27:16.12: asuci → vasalī (bj, mr); vasali (sya-all) | asucī → vasalī (bj, mr); vasali (sya-all)
dn27:18.7: candimasūriyā → … suriyā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | Sayaṃpabhāya → tāya (bj)
dn27:22.1: sattānaṃyeva → te sattānaṃyeva (cck, sya1ed); tesaṃ sattānaṃyeva (sya2ed); tesaṃ yeva kho vāseṭṭha sattānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn27:22.10: paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyantī’ti, jhāyantīti kho → paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyanti jhāyantīti kho pana (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyanti te kho (sya-all); paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyantīti kho (mr)
dn27:23.4: Na dānime → na dānime jhāyanti na dānime (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
dn27:24.1: visukammante → vissutaṃ kammante (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); vissukammante (si); visuṃ kammante (sya-all, mr)
